column1: Smoque BBQ////First: the sides.  We personally enjoyed the mac n cheese and peach cobbler very much however the BBQ beans and brisket chili weren't quite up to our standards.  The BBQ beans had too bold of a flavor in that they were too sweet and too sour.  It was quite hard eating them alone however perhaps if eaten with cornbread
column2: it possibly wouldn't have been as bad.  The brisket chili was really just average
column3: can't say much else about it.
